posts.title: BestGamer’s Minecraft Overhaul
posts.description: Honestly, I enjoy vanilla Minecraft survival, but there’s a lot of changes I would personally make to it. Lot’s of removed or unused content I would like to bring in...
posts.content: Honestly, I enjoy vanilla Minecraft survival, but there’s a lot of changes I would personally make to it. Lot’s of removed or unused content I would like to bring into the game, plenty of general quality of life features, and especially more End content. So that’s what my goal is for this addon! It’ll try to improve your experience across all 3 dimensions, with new blocks, mobs, ores and more! There’s quite a lot to go through with this so I’ve separated each dimension into it’s own section. Get ready for a deep dive!

posts.title: LADA Priora Car NEW UPDATE
posts.description: This is Priora - Legacy Car From Russia. LADA Priora is a family of restyled Russian cars, previously named  Lada 110 ,  Lada 111 , Lada 112, Group III of a small class, produced by AvtoVAZ PJSC from 2007 to 2018. The head model of the family is a sedan, bearing according to the industry standard OH 025270-66 VAZ-2170. This addon is copyrighted, it is forbidden to publish on other sites
posts.content: Since the beginning of 2009, the Priora family has completely ousted the bodywork family in its original form - LADA 110 from the assembly line. As of May 16, 2012, 650,000 vehicles have been produced. In 2011, there were minor changes to the car - the front bumper, rear-view mirrors and steering wheel were replaced.

posts.title: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.description: Minecraft Mod One Block - New Experience in Minecraft World
posts.content: Minecraft One Block Mod is an addition that brings a different and interesting experience to the world of Minecraft. With this mod, you will discover new worlds inside a single block. The challenge starts when you start your adventure inside the block. Within these single blocks, you'll find different layers that feature a variety of resources and creatures. Starting from farming, pets, to challenging enemies, everything is in the block. The One Block mod gives you the freedom to explore and build within the block. You can explore and get the necessary resources to expand your territory. Get ready to face new challenges and discover the magic hidden in this single block. With this mod, you can transform your Minecraft gaming experience into something completely new and exciting. Enjoy a unique adventure and exploration in a limited environment full of surprises. Explore the world of Minecraft with the One Block mod and discover the uniqueness and magic in this single block. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure and face new challenges that await in it. Download the Minecraft One Block mod now and start a new adventure in the world of Minecraft!

ATTENTION! THIS IS NOT A PORT. TEXTURES ARE MADE BY ME, AND DESIGNED BY ME. THE CONCEPT OF THIS ADDON WAS ICE AND FIRE'S WEAPONS AND ARMOR, BUT THIS IS ORIGINAL WORK, AND I DID NOT USE ASSETS FROM THE ORIGINAL MOD.

This addon is probably not as good as other addon you would see today.

posts.title: Prehistoric Rift
posts.description: Greetings fellow human beings, and welcome to the world of Prehistoric Rift! This addon aims to expand upon the gameplay of Minecraft by adding prehistoric creatures and enhance...
posts.content:
Greetings fellow human beings, and welcome to the world of Prehistoric Rift! This addon aims to expand upon the gameplay of Minecraft by adding prehistoric creatures and enhances the vanilla experience!
Before playing with this addon, turn on commands, holiday creator features, creation of custom biomes, additional modding capabilities, upcoming creator features, enable gametest framework, and experimental molang features in your world.
Please note that when distributing the addon, only use the mcpedl page or the github related links. You can also make a video about this addon but don't make it a dumb clickbaity one.
If you spot any bugs or if you have suggestions you can post them in the bugtracker on GitHub. Just make sure to browse the area first. You may also feel free to join my discord server where you can casually hang out, or the twitter account for updates.
The addon also has a wiki where all information about it is documented at due to the amount of things this addon has so far, which you can read if you like. You're also free to contribute anything useful there.
This addon is compatible with Borgy's Mobs btw, but in order to make them work together you need to download the compatibilizer.
If you really like this addon btw, you can donate to me on Ko-Fi. You're not obligated to donate, but it at least motivates me to continue working on this addon and any others that I may make.

posts.title: YRed's Swords: Reference Update
posts.description: Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they mi...
posts.content:
Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they might suck. Also, I'm new to coding addons, so I haven't learned how to set up durability yet, meaning that all of these weapons are unbreakable, and i might keep it that way.
Also, this addon doesn't use player.json, so feel free to use it with any other mods, it won't break your world :)
There are different "Tiers" of swords based on how many times you have to craft to get them. For example,
Tier 1 Swords = swords crafted with basic materials, Tier 2 Swords = swords crafted with two tier one swords or a tier one sword with some other materials, Tier 3 Swords = swords crafted with two tier two swords or a tier two with other materials, etc.

Designed to transform the game's blocks, items, and environments into a vibrant tapestry of fall colors, this texture pack brings a whole new level of immersion to your Minecraft experience.As you explore the blocky landscapes, you'll be greeted by rich hues of red, orange, and golden yellow, reminiscent of the breathtaking foliage that blankets forests during the autumn season. It's time to immerse yourself in the splendor of autumn like never before!

posts.title: Blocky Battle
posts.description: Hi! i’m Harobrnin, the creator of Blocky Battle, and it seems you have found my world! I hope you enjoy it with your friends and family. (strange intro I know hahaha!)Just...
posts.content:
Hi! i’m Harobrnin, the creator of Blocky Battle, and it seems you have found my world! I hope you enjoy it with your friends and family. (strange intro I know hahaha!)
Just so you know, blocky battle is a fun class fighting game that I made a long time ago on my a school laptop. (2018)
I remember suggesting classes to the other 8th graders like "I suggest alchemist" or "a good class would be sniper"
this world contains -
an arena
7 free classes
3 purchasable classes
funny class quotes
less bugs than any other class fighting game
a cool class selection system
death!
4 attacks with each class
did i mention death?
10% more death

posts.title: Avatar Addon!
posts.description: OverviewThis addon adds the four nations bending abilities from the show Avatar the last Airbender (ALTA or atla)! Create realms, and customize the addon to fit your playstyle u...
posts.content:
Overview
This addon adds the four nations bending abilities from the show Avatar the last Airbender (ALTA or atla)! Create realms, and customize the addon to fit your playstyle using the in-game settings.
When you start out, nothing will happen. First, you will have the bending scroll in your hotbar upon entry into the world. After that, you can choose your bending by opening it (long press or right click). The options are avatar, fire, earth, water, air, and human (normal vanilla Minecraft, with the ability to learn chi-blocking).
When you pick a bending style, nothing will happen either - you need to choose your moves for each of your “slots”. For instance, if you sneak then punch you will use whatever move is bound to slot 4. Let’s say you are an Airbender and used the scroll to set slot 4 to Air Blast - when you sneak and punch, you will use Air Blast. You can use your scroll to bind moves to slots. Just right-click/long press on your scroll, and click on the sub-menu button “Choose Slots”. Try picking slot 4 first(remember to click on submit after all slots choice have been filled), since it’s the simplest. Eventually, you’ll have your slots memorized, and a set of 4 moves you like best. These 4 that you have “slot-loaded” are what make you different from other benders of the same type.
Each type of bender will have a different moveset, and each individual bender will have an even more varied set of moves. As you level up, you get access to more moves. To level up, simply go about as normal - using moves will help you level up, but don’t try to afk, it won’t work. Sometimes, bending can get annoying while just going about your normal tasks, so you can turn it off for a bit by holding arrows in your off-hand, or by typing right clicking/long pressing the scroll and then clicking/tapping settings and clicking/tapping the button that says "Enable Bending".
The moves and abilities of these classes are outlined below, and also through the bending scroll with the "Bending Info" section.
Have fun playing!

posts.title: YRed's Swords: Reference Update
posts.description: Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they mi...
posts.content:
Hello! This is my first addon. It consists of several swords, of which I tried to make balanced, but since it's my first time making a mod, they might be overpowered, or they might suck. Also, I'm new to coding addons, so I haven't learned how to set up durability yet, meaning that all of these weapons are unbreakable, and i might keep it that way.
Also, this addon doesn't use player.json, so feel free to use it with any other mods, it won't break your world :)
There are different "Tiers" of swords based on how many times you have to craft to get them. For example,
Tier 1 Swords = swords crafted with basic materials, Tier 2 Swords = swords crafted with two tier one swords or a tier one sword with some other materials, Tier 3 Swords = swords crafted with two tier two swords or a tier two with other materials, etc.

posts.title: Utility UI | Bedrock Tweaks ( Compatible for All Versions! )
posts.description: Utility UI Bedrock Tweaks is a Minecraft resource pack designed to enhance the user interface (UI) and overall experience of playing the Bedrock Edition of the game. Developed w...
posts.content: Utility UI Bedrock Tweaks is a Minecraft resource pack designed to enhance the user interface (UI) and overall experience of playing the Bedrock Edition of the game. Developed with the aim of providing convenience and customization, this pack offers a range of subtle but impactful changes that make navigating menus and managing inventory a breeze.With Utility UI Bedrock Tweaks, you can expect a cleaner and more organized UI that optimizes space and reduces clutter. The pack introduces streamlined icons, improved text readability, and intuitive button designs, allowing you to access essential information and options with ease.Whether you're a builder, explorer, or redstone enthusiast, Utility UI Bedrock Tweaks aims to improve your Minecraft experience by providing a user-friendly and customizable interface. So why not give it a try and enjoy a more polished and efficient Bedrock Edition experience?

posts.title: Autumn Pack [ Texture Pack ]
posts.description: Introducing the Autumn Pack Minecraft texture pack! Immerse yourself in the enchanting beauty of autumn with this visually stunning add-on for Minecraft. Designed to transform t...
posts.content: Introducing the Autumn Pack Minecraft texture pack! Immerse yourself in the enchanting beauty of autumn with this visually stunning add-on for Minecraft. Designed to transform the game's blocks, items, and environments into a vibrant tapestry of fall colors, this texture pack brings a whole new level of immersion to your Minecraft experience.As you explore the blocky landscapes, you'll be greeted by rich hues of red, orange, and golden yellow, reminiscent of the breathtaking foliage that blankets forests during the autumn season. The textures are carefully crafted to capture the essence of this magical time of year, with leaves that appear crisp and ready to rustle under your virtual feet.rab your virtual pumpkin spice latte and embrace the beauty of fall with the Autumn Pack Minecraft texture pack. It's time to immerse yourself in the splendor of autumn like never before!

Just so you know, blocky battle is a fun class fighting game that I made a long time ago on my a school laptop. (2018)
I remember suggesting classes to the other 8th graders like "I suggest alchemist" or "a good class would be sniper"
this world contains -
an arena
7 free classes
3 purchasable classes
funny class quotes
less bugs than any other class fighting game
a cool class selection system
death!
4 attacks with each class
did i mention death?
10% more death

posts.title: Avatar Addon!
posts.description: OverviewThis addon adds the four nations bending abilities from the show Avatar the last Airbender (ALTA or atla)! Create realms, and customize the addon to fit your playstyle u...
posts.content:
Overview
This addon adds the four nations bending abilities from the show Avatar the last Airbender (ALTA or atla)! Create realms, and customize the addon to fit your playstyle using the in-game settings.
When you start out, nothing will happen. First, you will have the bending scroll in your hotbar upon entry into the world. After that, you can choose your bending by opening it (long press or right click). The options are avatar, fire, earth, water, air, and human (normal vanilla Minecraft, with the ability to learn chi-blocking).
When you pick a bending style, nothing will happen either - you need to choose your moves for each of your “slots”. For instance, if you sneak then punch you will use whatever move is bound to slot 4. Let’s say you are an Airbender and used the scroll to set slot 4 to Air Blast - when you sneak and punch, you will use Air Blast. You can use your scroll to bind moves to slots. Just right-click/long press on your scroll, and click on the sub-menu button “Choose Slots”. Try picking slot 4 first(remember to click on submit after all slots choice have been filled), since it’s the simplest. Eventually, you’ll have your slots memorized, and a set of 4 moves you like best. These 4 that you have “slot-loaded” are what make you different from other benders of the same type.
Each type of bender will have a different moveset, and each individual bender will have an even more varied set of moves. As you level up, you get access to more moves. To level up, simply go about as normal - using moves will help you level up, but don’t try to afk, it won’t work. Sometimes, bending can get annoying while just going about your normal tasks, so you can turn it off for a bit by holding arrows in your off-hand, or by typing right clicking/long pressing the scroll and then clicking/tapping settings and clicking/tapping the button that says "Enable Bending".
The moves and abilities of these classes are outlined below, and also through the bending scroll with the "Bending Info" section.
Have fun playing!
